mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_team (leader, title, description, slogan) VALUE (#{leader}, #{title}, #{description}, #{slogan})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_team, t_team_personnel, t_team_project USING t_team LEFT JOIN t_team_personnel ON t_team_personnel.team_id = t_team.id LEFT JOIN t_team_project ON t_team_project.team_id = t_team.id WHERE t_team.id = #{id}
